templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.intotheam.com/pages/track-your-order
templates.name: Order status/order tracking

templates.content: I'm afraid items marked final sale are not eligible for returns at this time.
templates.name: Can I return a final sale item?

templates.content: We require an active credit card in order to process your monthly subscription. We encourage you to use your gift card on other items in our store.
templates.name: Can I use a gift card to pay for my subscription?

templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out!
templates.name: Store location / retailer

templates.content: You can give us a call at +1 888 438 5443, Monday - Friday 09:00am - 05:00pm PST or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.
templates.name: Phone support

templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@intotheam.com. Our team is happy to help!
templates.name: Customer support

templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/intotheam/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/INTOTHEAM/
templates.name: Social media

templates.content: I'm afraid once an order has been placed we are unable to add or remove items. If you need to cancel your order you can call us at 1 (888) 438-5443 within 1 hour of placing your order and we will try to make every effort to honor your cancellation request.
templates.name: Cancel / edit order

templates.content: Yes, we ship to PO boxes and APO/FPO addresses. Orders shipped to these addresses will ship via USPS Mail service.
templates.name: Do you ship to APO/FPO addresses?

templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-3 business days and we usually ship via USPS, UPS, DHL, and FedEx. Once shipped it will take 5-8 business days for domestic orders.
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.intotheam.com/collections/sale-items
templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount

templates.content: We use a premium poly-cotton blend that gives you the best of both worlds: a buttery soft blank that is breathable, doesn't shrink, and lasts longer than 100% cotton tees.
templates.name: What fabric do you use for subscription tees?

templates.content: Because our subscription program is offered at such a deep discount, we are unable to accept promo codes.
templates.name: Why is my promo code not working on my subscription shirt?

templates.content: We offer size exchanges on your first month only. If you need to exchange your first month's t-shirt please send us an email at member@intotheam.com. If you need to update your t-shirt size you can do so at any time by logging into your account on our website. Make sure to update your size before the first of the following month.
templates.name: Can I exchange my T-Shirt Club size?

templates.content: Absolutely! Please note, we can only process one subscription order at a time. If you would like to sign-up for multiple subscriptions you will be required to place separate orders. You will be able to manage all of your orders within the same dashboard for your account.
templates.name: Can I purchase multiple subscriptions?

templates.content: Most of our garments range in size from XS-4XL. You can find a Size Guide in the product description portion of each product page.
templates.name: What sizes do you offer?

templates.content: Please allow for 3-5 days processing time once your item(s) have arrived back at our warehouse. Once your return has been processed, you will receive a follow-up email containing your refund or store credit information.
templates.name: How long does it take to process a return?

templates.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time by emailing our team at member@intotheam.com. We also offer the ability to skip a month rather than cancel your membership. If a little space is all you need, this flexible option is a perfect choice!
templates.name: How do I cancel my subscription?

templates.content: We've made our Instagram shoppable! You can shop your favorite looks here: https://www.instagram.com/intotheam/
templates.name: I really like an item I saw on your Instagram, how do I find it on your site?

templates.content: I'll be more than happy to check with the team if we can apply the code to your order! Can I please have your order number, email address, and the code that you wish to apply?
templates.name: Retroactive discount request

templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $100. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?
templates.name: Free shipping

templates.content: Each month you will receive a brand new never-before-seen premium graphic t-shirt for just $14.95, a 40% savings off our regular price of $24.95. Sign up by the last day of any month and your first t-shirt will ship by the 7th of the following month.
templates.name: How does the subscription program work?

templates.content: You can return your order for a refund or store credit. If you need to exchange your item(s) for a different size, style or color, please follow the steps on this link: https://intotheam.gorgias.help/en-US/can-i-exchange-my-order-146328
templates.name: Can I exchange my order?

templates.content:
If you need to update any information on your subscription including your t-shirt size, shipping address, or skipping a month, you can do so within your account on our website. You can cancel your subscription at any time by emailing our team at member@intotheam.com.  

If you need to make changes to your account, please make the change at least 2 days prior to the 1st of the month.
templates.name: How do I manage my subscription?

templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at support@intotheam.com. Our team is happy to chat.
templates.name: Wholesale inquiries

templates.content: Our t-shirts are fitted, yet cut in a way that is flattering on all body types. Slightly tapered with a standard length, the ultra-soft fabric highlights your good while concealing your not-so-good. 98% of our customer reviews recommend you order your normal t-shirt size. We stick by that recommendation!
templates.name: How do your t-shirts fit?

templates.content: All of our garments come with specific wash/care instructions to help you prevent damaging your items. Keep in mind, we offer many different types of fabrics on our site and every fabric needs to be treated differently. Please refer to the care label inside your garment for the best results.
templates.name: Do your clothes shrink after I wash them?

templates.content: If you need to update your t-shirt size you can do so at any time by logging into your account on our website. Make sure to update your size before the first of the following month.
templates.name: How do I update my T-Shirt Club size?

templates.content: We ship all subscriptions within the first 7 days of the month. You will receive an email with a tracking link once your package has been shipped.
templates.name: When does my monthly subscription ship?

templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can learn more and sign up for our affiliate program here: https://www.intotheam.com/pages/into-the-am-affiliate-program
templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program

templates.content: We prefer to surprise you with a one-of-a-kind, on-brand, design curated by our talented team of designers and merchandisers.
templates.name: Can I choose my own T-Shirt Club design?

templates.content: Good news for you! All past month's designs will be available on our website 30 days after their subscription month at full retail price.
templates.name: Can I purchase a past month's design?

templates.content: We offer a 110% price match guarantee. If you see another major competing online retailer selling a product that we carry for a cheaper price, we'll match the price and take an additional 10% off. You can learn more about it here: https://intotheam.gorgias.help/en-US/110%25-price-match-guarantee-146291
templates.name: Do you price match?

templates.content: In order to keep our pricing as competitive as possible, we do not offer returns for T-Shirt Club items. If you are not satisfied with a particular month's design, we encourage you to gift it to a friend and stick around for the following month. You'll be a true hero!
templates.name: Do you offer returns for T-Shirt Club items?

templates.content: Happy to help! I'd recommend taking a look at the size chart on each product page as well as the additional information noted under our "Size & Fit" section. If you're still unsure, just let me know!
templates.name: Sizing

templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://intotheam.gorgias.help/en-US/what-are-your-return-guidelines-947329
templates.name: Return policy

templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.intotheam.com/collections/sale-items
